website_summaries.verdict: Made with proprietary Adaptive Foam that’s infused with heat-wicking graphite to keep hot sleepers cool all night long.
pros: One of the original 'bed in a box' models that helped change the sleep industry
Partially made with cooling adaptive foam that offers superior support for your back
cons: There may be a slight odor after unboxing
This should go away in a few hours

website_summaries.verdict: One of the original foam mattress that set the bar and disrupted a whole industry.
pros: Multiple foam layers address a variety of sleep issues
A "Zoned Support" layer provides extra support for hips and shoulders, and there are pressure-reliving and breathable foam layers for people who sleep hot
cons: There may be a mild scent when you unbox it, but it should go away within a few hours

customer_reviews.title: My 14 year old son said that this was hot, and he felt stuck in it. Return is very difficult
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to try this mattress so I purchased a twin for my son. He disliked it from the beginning and said that it was hot, and he felt like he was stuck in the mud when sleeping on it. We started the return over 7 weeks ago, and the mattress was picked up over a month ago. This was an expensive item, almost $600 and I still have not seen a refund. Called Amazon several times and not seeing any result. I would not recommend this product or company.
customer_reviews.author: alexacsi

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer
customer_reviews.text: I am a believer. was very sceptical about these types of beds. Did alot of research and this one sleeps really good. It has relieved the pain in my lower back. Not much smell with when you first unpack it.
customer_reviews.author: C5Galaxy

customer_reviews.title: Same mattress , different weights ?
customer_reviews.text: I bought one queen mattress at Amazon and one directly at Casper’s website . Both same model , The Casper all foam original mattress queen size . The one purchased on Amazon is a LOT lighter than the one I got directly from Casper . Both have same reference number so it is a huge mistery to me how one mattress is roughly 20 lbs lighter than the other .
customer_reviews.author: Duca

customer_reviews.title: Supportive Mattress
customer_reviews.text: The mattress was delivered to my house. It was very easy to unwrap and position. Within minutes of removing it from the plastic, the king size mattress had achieved full size. I did not experience any objectionable smell and slept on it that first night. Really a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cruiser 1

customer_reviews.title: Not the perfect mattress for me
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 145 (female). This mattress, to me, feels like sleeping on the floor. My arms go numb when I sleep on my side, and I have women up on several occasions with severe backaches. I went to my chiropractor, and he suggested that I get rid of the Casper mattress. It is not great for everyone. Thank goodness for their 100 night test drive (although I only may it 2 weeks on this thing) Amazon has been great about this return. I wish it would've worked out for me, but we all have different mattress needs, so make your own decision. :)
customer_reviews.author: M. Kliner

customer_reviews.title: Old & expired mattresses sold through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first Casper direct 6 years ago and it was time to upgrade. The price on Amazon was better than casper.com so I ordered. The box arrived days later, covered in dust with a factory date nearly 1 year ago. Common knowledge, foam mattresses should not stay boxed and vacuum-packed for more than 3 months. I opened the box regardless hoping the mattress would be fine. 5 days later it still has not taken shape fully. After contacting casper.com they confirmed the mattress was likely damaged but I would have to deal with Amazon. Shame on casper.com to allow old stock to be sold through Amazon. Please refuse delivery if the mattress is older than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Loustar

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Best of all purchased two mattresses befire this which were no good, no support, pain the next day. This mattress is wonderful great support and no pain so far. About 3 weeks niw.
customer_reviews.author: Mariline

customer_reviews.title: Quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I am a side sleeper and was having hip pain with my old mattress. It turned out that I had bursitis but the new mattress really reduced the pain. I recommend this mattress as it is well made and much easier to handle than my old mattress which was latex foam. I made a wooden matrix per recommendation and placed both on the existing box spring. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Made Chronic Pain Much Worse :(
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this mattress based on the the product description and some of the reviews I had read. My fiancé and I are both permanently disabled and have overall chronic pain. This mattress made our 20 times worse!! Time to return it and go back to our split king mattress from Costco!
customer_reviews.author: MargieAnn Handelin

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep
customer_reviews.text: This bed is the best single purchase of my life...it is soft where you need it, firm where you need it, cool, comfortable, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Picker

customer_reviews.title: Mehhhh
customer_reviews.text: I was just really not that impressed with the Casper mattress. It was cool how it came in a box and everything, but I returned it because I thought I should’ve slept better and enjoyed it more since it’s pretty expensive. Their return policy is awesome though, I’ll give them that. I even gave it 60 days to see if I needed to get accustomed to it, but I just wasn’t a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Nicklas

customer_reviews.title: Feels great for years.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I had a 10" queen mattress for 3 years. We made that bed the spare in our house and ordered the 12" king. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carl R

customer_reviews.title: Medium Firmness
customer_reviews.text: If you love a really firm mattress this one is not for you. I bought this one after my old mattress (was 8+ years old) was giving me more hip and back pain and some friends said Casper relieved their problems. While it did eventually give me relief it is slightly less firm than i prefer. Also if a person or pet (weighing 30 or more lbs) sleeps close to you the mattress feels less supportive.
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: 2020 Original is not 2019 Original
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2019 Original and I love it. This 2020 version is not only softer, but also not 11" thick. I am feeling like Casper purposely made their Original name softer on purpose so customers would have to spend more to get the same firmness, thickness, and structure. I am disappointed Casper used the same name (Original) for a different style in 2020. Why not just use a different model name, or raise the price of the Original? Kinda regretting the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T G

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any experience with other foam mattresses to compare this too, but it's light years ahead of my old mattress. When I first sat on it, I was impressed at how it just seemed to absorb my energy. I've seen this mattress described as firm, but I like the combination of the top being soft enough to give and conform, but the bottom layer providing support. It's neither plush (where you sink in and lack support) nor hard .
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding mattress
customer_reviews.text: After sleeping on my son's Casper, I ordered this model, the original Casper. Very comfortable, easy to set up and rotate (when you choose to do it). Good separation of movement also, so your partner won't wake up if you chance to get up in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I did not like was the price. BUT this mattress lives up to it`s reputation for comfort, support and pain relief. There was no strong off- gassing smell like some foam mattresses have when you first open them. The mattress expanded very quickly which was nice since we did need to sleep on it the first night we got it. All-in-all the Casper mattress was almost everything we were looking for, even though it is a little expensive the price is still pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Casper good
customer_reviews.text: I say this a lot in my reviews...I am very happy with this purchase, lol. I don't have any ailments, just needed a new mattress and chose Casper after much research.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Taft

customer_reviews.title: Side Sleepers
customer_reviews.text: Our old mattress was about 12 years old, and my hips started to hurt every morning after getting up. We went to Consumer Reports, and this mattress was in the top 5, so we have had it about a month now. No more hip pain, and my wife and I sleep soundly. Great mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Terry R.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Nearly immediate back pain relief! However, anything was better than our old, previous mattress, and we have owned the Casper for less than a month. Fingers crossed it makes the 10 year mark !!
customer_reviews.author: EDS

customer_reviews.title: WRONG PRODUCT no solution
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a Full size 12" mattress and what arrived was an XL Twin. Called to have the matter expedited and crickets. They couldn't do anything to rectify their mistake. Last time ordering thru Amazon for some thing like this.
customer_reviews.author: lyllbit

customer_reviews.title: Casper is a scam
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Felt good for a week. Felt ok for a month or too then turned to a lumpy suppportless waste of space. Now I have a 1200 piece of trash that I have to figure out how to get rid of. Do not buy. Back using my 10 year old matress we put in the guestroom. Worst investment I've made in a decade. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Brian Conley

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: A bit softer than out previous "memory foam " mattress which is now in our guest bedroom. First thing I noticed is that you sink into the casper, its like sleeping on a big pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: In love with this mattress
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about buying this mattress! But I’m so glad I did it was very comfortable. The only problem is I want to stay in bed all day! In love
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: No good-grease stained, and then wrapped in plastic, shipped.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy. It came as promised, drove it 2 hours on Saturday to another home I have, dragged it upstairs in the box, unboxed and unwrapped it... to find 5 huge grease stains on it. Now what?
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: don't believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: probably works fine for the petite lady in the ads. it's better than the old foam matresses, but still has the support issues for lower back. I'm 5' 8" 175 lbs. so it's not like i'm big and fat. Rated best for side sleepers, but did not work well for me. i actually felt worse after using this bed. returned after trying for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Could not get used to it
customer_reviews.text: The mattress measurement was supposed to expand to 11” but never got above 9”. Could not get comfortable and found the mattress made us warmer instead of cooler. Shoulder was more painful as I am a side sleeper, could not find a comfortable position. Please be advised however that other people I’ve known have lauded the Casper. It all come down to individual comfort.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get the smell out of mattress
customer_reviews.text: Overall this mattress is very nice. The one big issue is the chemical/plastic smell that takes forever to dissipate. Tried sleeping on if after a couple of days of airing out and still couldn't sleep on it. I would put a fan on it all day and try again. This went on for a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: u will be very happy if u get one
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought two one for me an one for my brother same time when they were on sale black Friday best money I ever spent I tried cheeper ones don't do that u get what u pay for get one of these
customer_reviews.author: derrell Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase it feels awesome to finally get a good night sleep and not wake up sore.
customer_reviews.author: Boxer lover

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Have to admit a little apprehensive at first, mattress in a box! Its without a doubt the most comfortable mattress I have ever purchased, plus the grandkids kids had a good laugh watching it inflate as soon as you remove.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This mattress in the first 5 min is comfortable. IF YOU HAVE ANY LOWER BACK ISSUES DO NOT BUY THIS MATTRESS!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Lynn Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Definitely very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The set up instructions could be a lot better otherwise it seems to be a very high-quality product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 🙂
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and firm Only problem is it has a odor Sat outside a week. Still smells a little but worth the comfort
customer_reviews.author: Catherine R.

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep. Glad I got this over the purple.
customer_reviews.text: So far? Amazing. Hopefully it stands the test of time. Between this and the purple for $300 more (At the time). Purple was definitely different. More comfy? Maybe. $300 more comfy? Definitely not. Got the Casper. Don’t regret it one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Graham

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this matress for about 9 months and i love it. Still firm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: GalanSalvius

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress. It is very comfortable and a good price. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: DAK

customer_reviews.title: Do be afraid to buy this mattress online-it’s fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous about buying a mattress online, but I am so glad I did. This mattress is so comfortable! My back feels wonderful in the morning when I wake up. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: We are not completely through our 100 nights, but there is no doubt we purchased the right mattress! We love our Casper!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Comfortable. Just took a few days to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Sooner1

customer_reviews.title: Stiffer than expected but...
customer_reviews.text: definitely improved my sleep patterns and eliminated much of my lower back pain. If your 180+ lbs it's a bit stiffer than I would have expected, probably more for my wife who is under 140lbs. But well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: NickM

customer_reviews.title: My daughter ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️S it
customer_reviews.text: My partner and I bought it for my daughter. She says it’s heavenly. A bit in the firm side, softened by a topper that makes it a 6.
customer_reviews.author: Medical Marketing Maven

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress. It keeps me from sweating in my sleep. I wish the edges were a bit firmer as I slide off while putting my socks on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Henthorne

customer_reviews.title: No more back pain
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress . I am a side/back sleeper . Perfect . No more backaches .
customer_reviews.author: pilates3150

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Our first Casper Mattress had black foot prints on back side. Sent it back. Our 2nd one had one little black spot on back side. Other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: mike boss

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a terrible sleeper, but he’s actually getting a good night’s sleep with this mattress. Downside: not great for toddlers who want to jump on the bed. It’s not bouncy.
customer_reviews.author: Christen Klochan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and we won’t go back to traditional inner springs ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort and lack of movement distribution. I can move and not wake up my wife!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great matress for those with sleep issues.
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress I've ever had. Relieved my sleep issues and back pain where other brands had failed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try Casper, your sleep will never be the same!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it’s like sleeping and a cloud with just the right support. I used to tease my brother for spending twice as much as me on a mattress until i bought one for myself. I’ve never slept better!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is awful...very hard. I like firm but this is ridiculous. Found a 4” mattress topper so now it is bearable. Please do not waste your money on this model. I had more back problems within one week of sleeping on this darn thing. Spend your hard earned money on another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Billy J. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: My light wife says Excellent. I say good. let's not believe that the same mattress can be perfect for two people with big diferences in weight and size can be perfect for both.
customer_reviews.author: skip

customer_reviews.title: Casper is a great mattress.
customer_reviews.text: We love our Casper mattress. It helps my husband with his bad back. It is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rohlf

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable - I can actually sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. My old mattress caused back pain. I now wake up pain free!
customer_reviews.author: Christina S.

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my choice and enjoy the comfort of my new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Strum

customer_reviews.title: A Dream
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress for back pain I’ve slept on. Highly satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: kewago

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: We both love this bed and plan to replace another one with the exact same one!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bennett Riddick

customer_reviews.title: bed
customer_reviews.text: super comfy No back pain or other issues Great bed
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: It is the most comfortable mattress I have slept on. I used to wake up off and on all night now I sleep straight through.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and best value.
customer_reviews.text: The value and quality of the product. My husband and I both enjoy this mattress and look forward to a good night's sleep daily.
customer_reviews.author: Pumkin1

customer_reviews.title: Too firm
customer_reviews.text: Too firm for people in there 50’s or 60’s. Doesn’t give for sore shoulders
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Have only been using for 2 months, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: pen-y-bryn

customer_reviews.title: No more aches and pains in the morning !
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME ! Everything you would expect from Casper ! I am a side sleeper with lower back pain when I wake, this bed supports and gives just enough for a great night of sleep. NO BACK PAIN !! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Robert  Clyde

customer_reviews.title: The new mattress smells super strong
customer_reviews.text: Hello - I got my mattress a few weeks ago now but the smell is still unbearable. Does anyone know what I can do about it?
customer_reviews.author: Irmak T.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! It was magic coming out of that box! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Jones

customer_reviews.title: Need more foam
customer_reviews.text: It took some of the pain away but still have hip pain no more shoulder pain or neck pain would be nice if sheets or two pillows would come with the order
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over priced, not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Too hard, no better than my old mattress a Serta
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Nice and firm but not too firm. I’ve been sleeping great since buying this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Allen D Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for side sleeper
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is very comfortable. I bought it because I kept pinching a nerve on my old mattress from sleeping on my side. It is worth the steeper price.
customer_reviews.author: Moses M

product_meta.title: Casper Original Foam Queen Mattress, 2020 Model
product_meta.description:
Style:2020 Model| Size:QueenCasper is reimagining sleep from the ground up. All of Casper’s sleep products are developed in-house by our award-winning research and development team.

The Casper Original Foam mattress is the perfect combination of support and cooling. Our ZonedSupportTM has three areas of targeted support for proper spinal alignment. Soft foam around the shoulders provide more relief to the upper body. Firmer foam under the hips, waist, and lower back help align your spine. AirScapeTM is present in the top layer of the mattress. The perforated breathable foam helps reduce heat. Tiny holes move hot air and body heat away, keeping you cool throughout the night. This premium foam is plush, yet resilient and conforms to your body to relieve pressure. The durable base foam prevents sinking and sagging and supports the whole body. The eco-friendly cover is made with recycled materials and easily zips off. It's designed to withstand years of use. The knit mattress covers have four way stretch, so you feel the full benefits of the below layers.

Still unsure? Rest easy with our 100-night trial and free returns.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Casper Original Foam Queen Mattress, 2020 Model with cover
Mattress dimensions: 60” W x 80” L x 11” H. Foam weight: 79 lbs

Softer foam around the shoulders provides more relief-push feel to the upper body. Firmer foam under the hips, waist, and lower back helps align your spine. For cooling, a top layer of perforated breathable foam helps reduce heat, Tiny holes move hot air and body heat away

The CertiPUR-US program certifies all our foams, They are made without ozone-depleting chemicals and are regulated by the Consumer Product Safety Commission Low VOC (Volatile Organic Compound) emissions for indoor air quality (less than 0.5 parts per million)
100 night trial and free returns within 100 days of receipt of shipment on products sold by Casper on Original Foam 2020
3 zones of targeted support for proper spinal alignment.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars365 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
